original_text:
The way of the sluggard is blocked with thorns,
    but the path of the upright is a highway.
korean_text: 게으른 자의 길은 가시 울타리 같으나 정직한 자의 길은 대로니라

sentences.original_text: The way of the sluggard is blocked with thorns
sentences.korean_translation: 게으른 자의 길은 가시덩굴로 막혀 있으나

sentences.original_text: the path of the upright is a highway
